segments.text: Honestly, this whole situation is starting to make me quite agitated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That sink has been overflowing for what feels like ages now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's total unawareness is truly astounding; it makes me so surprised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is practically swimming, and she's just polishing that plate!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried about the stability of that stool the boy is on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just a matter of time before it gives way, sending him tumbling down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is so slick; anyone could slip and get badly hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of a child falling in a puddle of water with broken dishes is just terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s an accident waiting to happen, a truly stressful sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of adult supervision for those adventurous children is quite concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel somewhat disgusted by the utter mess that's developing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and make her aware of the dangers surrounding her!
segments.speaker: PAR
